title: Breakdown
author: VD
content_html:
On the off-chance that you happen to be interested in this sort of data:

TIA downloads

PDF 59 percent
DOC 27 percent
PDB 9 percent
LIT 5 percent


While I’m pleased to see LIT bringing up the rear, as an inveterate Treo reader, I’m a little annoyed to see that the Palm Reader downloads don’t even double those for Microsoft Reader. Also, I should probably mention that we’re into the four digits already since Friday afternoon.
content_text:
On the off-chance that you happen to be interested in this sort of data:
TIA downloads
PDF 59 percent
DOC 27 percent
PDB 9 percent
LIT 5 percent
While I’m pleased to see LIT bringing up the rear, as an inveterate Treo reader, I’m a little annoyed to see that the Palm Reader downloads don’t even double those for Microsoft Reader.  Also, I should probably mention that we’re into the four digits already since Friday afternoon.
